p: Seasonality of the PED epidemic may link to environmental factors such as the drop of ambient temperature. Physiological stress experienced under cold exposure leads to a weakening of immune response [ 36] and increased Hsp70 levels [ 13, 14]. It has been reported that Hsp70 could promote influenza A virus replication through modulates polymerase activity [ 18]. Also, low ambient temperature has been shown to shape the seasonality of influenza [ 37, 38]. Obviously, low environmental temperature is related to the outbreak and spread of infectious diseases.
